abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Telecommunications
            and Information Communication Technology (ICT) Development
            Project for Organization of Eastern Caribbean States (OECS)
            is to improve the access, quality and use of
            telecommunications and ICT services to achieve
            socio-economic development in the OECS. The reallocation is
            necessary to correct a mistake that was made by the World
            Bank in processing an earlier reallocation request. The
            reallocation is also necessary in order to meet urgent
            payments that have become due under category one, as well as
            to adjust the funding under category three, for credits,
            which had been mistakenly over-drafted.
